Sentencas: The mathematical model of the solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) is presented.
Titulo: A Mathematical Model of SOFC: A Proposal

Sentencas: The new approach for modeling the voltage of SOFC is proposed.
Titulo: A Mathematical Model of SOFC: A Proposal

Sentencas: Electrochemical, thermal, electrical, and flow parameters are collected in the 0D mathematical model.
Titulo: A Mathematical Model of SOFC: A Proposal

Sentencas: The aim was to combine all cell working conditions in as a low number of factors as possible and to have the factors relatively easy to determine.
Titulo: A Mathematical Model of SOFC: A Proposal

Sentencas: A validation process for various experimental data was made and adequate results are shown.
Titulo: A Mathematical Model of SOFC: A Proposal

Sentencas: The presented model was validated for various fuel mixtures in relatively wide ranges of parameters as well as for various cell design parameters (e.g. electrolyte thickness, anode porosity, etc.).
Titulo: A Mathematical Model of SOFC: A Proposal

Sentencas: A distinction is made between the design-point and off-design operation.
Titulo: A Mathematical Model of SOFC: A Proposal
